shared.appStoreButtonsTitle: Accede a los beneficios de la aplicación Mounting Manager - ¡Descárgala ahora!

meta.title: Schaeffler Mounting Manager
meta.description: El Schaeffler Mounting Manager le facilita la selección cómoda del montaje correcto de los rodamientos y ofrece las siguientes posibilidades: muestra algunos procedimientos mecánicos e hidráulicos, calcula los parámetros de montaje requeridos, ofrece instrucciones de montaje útiles, genera una lista con los accesorios y herramientas necesarios

legal.purpose: </br>In the Mounting Manager, user inputs such as bearing selection and operating parameters are used to carry out calculations in order to issue a mounting recommendation. Your anonymized user data is stored on the Microsoft Azure platform and displayed in the form of a dashboard. This gives us the opportunity to evaluate user behavior in the Mounting Manager in order to be able to make strategic decisions about the further development of the Mounting Manager.</br>Your anonymized user data is stored on the Microsoft Azure platform and displayed in the form of a dashboard. This gives us the opportunity to evaluate user behavior in the Mounting Manager in order to be able to make strategic decisions about the further development of the Mounting Manager.
